<html>
    <head>
        <title>org.aquameta.ui.layout tests</title>
        <script src='/system.js'></script>
        <script>
            System.import( '/widget.js' ).then( function( widget ) {
                var db = new AQ.Database( '/endpoint/0.1', { evented: 'no' } );
                window.endpoint = db;
                
                AQ.Widget.import( 'org.aquameta.ui.layout', 'layout', endpoint );
                AQ.Widget.import( 'org.aquameta.core.ide', 'ide', endpoint );
                $('body').append( widget( 'layout:demo' ) );
                $('body').append( widget( 'ide:debugger3_manager' ) );
                
            }).catch( function( e ) {
                console.log( 'System.js error:', e );
            });
         </script>
    </head>
    <body></body>
</html>

<html>
    <head>
        <title>org.aquameta.ui.layout tests</title>
        <script src='/system.js'></script>
        <script>
            System.import( '/widget.js' ).then( function( widget ) {
                var db = new AQ.Database( '/endpoint/0.1', { evented: 'no' } );
                window.endpoint = db;

                // some commonly used bundles
                AQ.Widget.import( 'org.aquameta.core.ide', 'ide', endpoint );
                AQ.Widget.import( 'org.aquameta.ui.layout', 'layout', endpoint );
                $('body').append( widget( 'layout:demo' ) );

                // add the on-screen debugger
                $('body').append( widget( 'ide:debugger3_manager' ) );

            }).catch( function( e ) {
                console.log( 'System.js error:', e );
            });
         </script>
    </head>
    <body></body>
</html>
